name: places/ChIJozrBd6VYwokROEO_Ill3O4A
adrFormatAddress: 1781 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10128-3625, USA

originalText.text: I love Synergy Fitness Clubs, in the Upper Eastside NY, NY. When I first set foot into this gym I was not very impressed with it. I was given a tour by a very friendly staff. The club has every fitness equipment and more for me and anyone to meet our fitness goals. I thought the staff was just being nice, extremely professional and friendly to lure me into signing up. So I decided to check out their membership reviews online. I was absolutely impressed by all the great things being said about Synergy and their staff, like how friendly, accommodating they are, and how easy it is to cancel . So as my new year's resolutions I made my decision to give them a chance. I thought, what the heck. It is absolutely inexpensive to join and if I'm not satisfied I just cancel it, as it is just as easy to do. Well it's been a couple of years since I joined and it has been an amazing fitness experience and journey for me. Unfortunately, I'm relocating for work to California at the end of the year, and true to their word and policy they made it effortlessly and seamlessly for me to cancel my membership. In addition, I have been invited back to visit by the staff whenever I'm in town. Thank you Synergy Fitness Clubs for the amazing unique and family-like fitness experience you have given me. It's been my best New Year's Resolution I've ever made so far.

originalText.text: I've been coming to this gym for 10 years. Besides the convenient location right in my neighborhood, the staff here has really gotten to know me, and has helped me serve my Fitness needs with their workout equipment, as well as their personal training services.  I got tired of the super corporate overpriced gyms, and always gravitate to the smaller neighborhood places, so this was a huge attraction for me. Also, as a visually impaired athlete, the staff is always very accommodating, and the other customers here, who see me pretty much all the time, are generally very friendly and courteous. I highly recommend this gym.

Bernice has helped me get stronger than I‚Äôve ever been and get comfortable with strength training (I was strictly cardio and yoga only before I joined this gym).

originalText.text:
I recently joined Synergy Fitness and their hospitality has been second to none - The community that they have created is incredible and very welcoming.

The manager (Ray) is always looking for ways to make it a better gym for all. I am so happy I found this hidden gem - can‚Äôt wait to see all of my results in 2024!

PS - their prices are extremely low for any gym‚Ä¶. Especially in New York.

originalText.text: I been coming to the gym a year and half I was introduced to this trainer name Emro he is such a great trainer. He motivates me on my toughest days. He uplift me and that is very important to have in a trainer. He is very honest and will meant you where you are in you workout journey. The staff at this gym is also very welcoming and very supportive. Just for insight am a beginner.
